item.title: Weekly Review #06 - Sincerity, Games, and Self-Adjustment
item.description: 'Here After Us - Mayday' Preface This piece is a record and reflection of my life from 2022-08-01 to 2022-08-07. In terms of work rhythm, it was far from busy, and I even got home as early as 7 p.m. on several days, which was rare. The extra leisure time allowed me to think more about my personality and state of life, and to organize many previously scattered thoughts.
